website_summaries.verdict: Works like a traditional radio in a waterproof model. A reliable shower radio and a great deal.
pros: Compact and basic, yet feature-rich: lightweight, water-resistant, AM/FM, hanging strap, and more
cons: Lacks the bells and whistles of other models on our list
However, it offers a lot for its low price

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this radio
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this radio. I bought a VERY large suction cup, with attached hook, from the "Holiday Time" product lines via Walmart (at Christmas). It works perfectly so I have this radio now hanging on, via this suction cup, in my shower. Works VERY well.
customer_reviews.author: Funny Honey

customer_reviews.title: Simple Shower Radio
customer_reviews.text: I received the radio today and have already used it in the shower. It was simple to use and my stations were clear and the volume control worked well. I like that it only requires 2 AA batteries. The directions were included, which has not always happened for me. A year later now and it is harder to rotate the on/off volume tuner especially with wet hands.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea J

customer_reviews.title: I love, love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love this! So nice not having to use my cell phone on counter while showering. I hang this radio on the window ceil in the shower (away from the water) and I am able to jam to my favorite Christian station. Since it's in the shower I can keep the volume loud enough to hear it, but not to loud to wake everyone else in the house up. The volume control, off/on is on the blue round front dial so it'll be easy to use. The rope/string was great to hang it up. I am SO happy with this purchase and wish I had bought it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Curlz

customer_reviews.title: Mini AM/FM Radio
customer_reviews.text: Radio arrived on time and was well packaged, no damage to box or item. I am actually quite surprised with this little radio - it's better than I expected! Once I found a good place for it the sound comes out strong even though it's not "stereo" quality it's just what I wanted. It's perfect for my bathroom and I've been searching for quite some time to find a battery operated radio that didn't cost a fortune. I am very pleased with my purchase. Thanks DealChasers & Amazon.!
customer_reviews.author: Palm Desert Girl

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t buy this again
customer_reviews.text: I have 10 radios in my house, and they all work just fine. They all pick up all the stations around Dallas. This one doesn’t pick up more than 2, and one of them is always the Spanish radio station (no, it’s not on the AM setting). It doesn’t matter what type of batteries you use, they drain very quickly. The buttons on this are also very awkward. It’s just a huge dial that controls both the volume and tuner. It’s easy to try to turn it up, gently bump the tuner and then lose the station it took you 30 minutes to get. I wouldn’t buy this again. There’s gotta be a better way.
customer_reviews.author: TraceyG

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: After a radio I had for more than decade finally failed, I bought this as a replacement and it didn't even last 6 months! You would think that with more than half a century of experience building transistor radios, making a good one would be easy by now! Can you say "planned obsolescence"? I am very disappointed, and will be looking elsewhere for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic shower radio
customer_reviews.text: Logically designed. Picks up a surprising amount of stations. Attractive. The hanging strap is a great feature. I would recommend them to add a suction cup. The speaker is OK, but you are in the shower, so sound quality is not going to be great anyway. I used it to listen to the news or talk shows while in the shower right before going to work. Nice little radio, and much better than others I had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: JG Rackley

customer_reviews.title: I bought it hoping the larger tuning face wold make tuning better than its predecessor
customer_reviews.text: I think this radio was not well designed. The volume dial frequently sticks to the tuning dial and the tuning dial doewn's have an audible click that can be heard when the unit is turned off or that can be felt when it is turned off. As for tuning, it is somewhat difficult to tune. I bought it hoping the larger tuning face wold make tuning better than its predecessor. I did not find that to be the case. I would buy the older model over this model.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to listen to a particular station while I'm in the shower and getting ready for work. It was really difficult to find the station on the radio, and when I finally did, the radio had to be turned a specific direction to get decent reception. The sound was muffled, so it was still difficult to hear clearly. Gradually the dial isn't working, and I have a really hard time finding my station. Today I gave up and decided to toss the radio and spend more money on something that works.
customer_reviews.author: cheryl s.

customer_reviews.title: Works Well for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: For being inexpensive, I am pleasantly surprised at how well and clear this works. It is small and hangs just outside my shower door. the sound is clear and can be turned up loud. This works better than my last more expensive radio. I was worried I wouldn't be able to dial in the prices station I wanted since it isn't digital, but I can and it is clear.
customer_reviews.author: pvb173

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little radio!
customer_reviews.text: The sound on this little radio is amazing. I put this one in the shower and now I'm going to order another one to take to the pool. I have ordered and received my second radio. It is a great little radio.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Great Lo-Tech Way to Listen to Radio in the Shower
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an older shower radio that broke. My husband just wanted something easy to pick up sports radio while he was in the shower and this fit the bill. Have only had about a week, but the reception has been good and there have been no problems with it wandering off the station. We live in a suburban area, so plenty of radio stations close by to choose from. The sound is what you would expect for a lower tech device. But, hey, it's a shower radio! It's not like we are looking for surround sound!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon T.

customer_reviews.title: Rear speaker makes for low sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Price and sound quality were both low. It works ok at low volume, but with the speaker being rear facing, the sound is distorted as it bounces off the tile wall. Intolerable at the volume you need when shower is running. Tried letting it hang in front of a towel to cut down distortion, but then it was too muffled. Probably will donate this one to thrift store, since I had to buy a different type to meet our needs.
customer_reviews.author: karen b.

customer_reviews.title: Defective!
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase this product, upon giving it a good review at time of purchase, I have found that the product ( radio) has ALREADY STOPPED WORKING. WE have replaced the batteries several times, it works for a few minutes than stops again. Defective!
customer_reviews.author: Kim foster MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: It stinks, and I don't like it.
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this thing stinks. Terrible reception of AM stations, whereas the cheap radio it replaced had no trouble. Also, who thought it was a good idea to put the on off dial inside the tuner dial so that you always mess up the tuning when turning it on? Please find something else to buy, or failing that, learn to hum. You'll be happier.
customer_reviews.author: John Paul

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable
customer_reviews.text: This radio works intermittently, and when it does it cannot stayed tuned to the station I want. I have to turn it on and off a few times each morning to get it to tune in at all. It then tunes to the station after I jiggle the dial awhile, plays for a few minutes, and then loses the signal altogether. After that, it is impossible to find the station again before my shower is done. I have given up on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon E.

customer_reviews.title: Shocked at look & size
customer_reviews.text: This is the cheapest looking thing when you actually see it. I must have missed what they said about size but wow this thing is tiny. I mean nano. I do have to give them credit for their returns. They were quick. I think they actually responded that same day.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki M.

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I previously had the Conair shower radio and the on/off button stopped working. It was a press to turn on then press to turn off and eventually it would no longer stay on. This on/off button is a turn button which I think will work well for the long-term. I get good reception and the volume is good enough to hear over the shower. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K.

customer_reviews.title: Sound just ok and NOT water resistant
customer_reviews.text: This was used for when I sea kayak and it FAILED to operate after 10 uses without ever going in the water. Sound is good not great due to simple antennae and watch that power is in the off position. simply not for water situation..
customer_reviews.author: p.s.

customer_reviews.title: Great Transaction and Product
customer_reviews.text: The transaction was easy, and the radio showed up on the day it was promised. I went ahead and checked it out to make sure it was worthy of giving to my uncle for Christmas. The radio has a good feel to it, and all the mechanics move smoothly. It is well put together, and I am happy to give it to my uncle. Thank you so much Deal Chasers! I will definitely come back to you for other purchases.
customer_reviews.author: pamela hurban

customer_reviews.title: Works just fine!
customer_reviews.text: Its a bit smaller than I thought but it hangs nicely on the towel bar in the shower with the provided rope. Reception in my bathroom is fine, I can get the radio stations I listen to, and the audio volume is fine. It is not the best sound quality, but hey its for a shower! For 15 minutes a day, its great.
customer_reviews.author: erotica junkie

customer_reviews.title: ... guys just don't perform as well as we would like??

This mini shower radio is as cute as it gets but the dial makes it very hard to find precisely the frequency you are seeking and the reception is mediocre at best. In my opinion, you would be much better off spending a bit more for a more user friendly and powerful unit. Sorry cute little guy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca K.

customer_reviews.title: Shower radio looks and works very well.
customer_reviews.text: Radio is as advertised. I like the compact size and ease of operation, especially the volume control. I am using it on my bathroom vanity and not in the shower, so I can't comment on the waterproof quality. I would recommend this radio as a veryngood value for the price.

customer_reviews.title: 1 song = 1 shower

This thing works great in the shower, it takes a couple of seconds to find the channel properly but after that it's smooth sailing. If you want a basic radio to listen to your favorite local music or talk radio stations, pick this thing up!
customer_reviews.author: horseguff

customer_reviews.title: Absolute garbage...threw away after 5 uses
customer_reviews.text: The dual dial system starts to stick after a few weeks. So the volume/on-off switch sticks and so it's difficult to turn the radio on after a while and when you do, it pushes the channel dial around so you lose the station you worked to get dialed in. It's worthless.

customer_reviews.title: Supply and Demand

It does work but the sound is not great and the station drifts in and out. It's only worth about half the price charged and I could accept the flaws if the price were closer to $5.99.

customer_reviews.title: Good radio for the money.

customer_reviews.title: so good - but I need to re-tune frequently

customer_reviews.title: Such a bad design with the on/off round dial being inset inside ...

It's hard enough to tune in a station because the tuning knob on inexpensive radios like this is imprecise to begin with. Having the on/off inset with it makes it nearly impossible to use. Wish I'd have listened to the other reviewer's comments!
customer_reviews.author: James Beck

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this radio
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this radio. My expectations were low (considering the price), but, I can't even make out what is being said or the song being played due to the seriously lacking speaker. Beyond the fact that you can't make out what is being played or said on the radio while the shower is running, the tuner selector is almost useless and not even close to being calibrated between the station it is receiving and the indication on the dial.

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed

customer_reviews.title: Don't Waste Your Time!

customer_reviews.title: Pyle PSR71 Showerproof  Radio Review

So far radio is waterproof, but too early to be sure.

customer_reviews.title: Pyle o' ....!

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars  dial setup needs improving

customer_reviews.title: since she isn't inclined to technological trends thus was a great option. The small speaker is capable of surprising ...

On a positive note, the sound quality is decent for a cheap radio. However, I can't recommend this radio and it's not worth returning.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the people who like this product live next door to the transmission towers ...

customer_reviews.title: Great little radio.

I've only had this a few days so this may or may not cause a problem later.

customer_reviews.title: Splash Proof Water Resistant Radio

The radio attaches from the shower rod from a cord. Like most shower radios and for a model this price, the performance is not stellar. However, it has better sound and selectivity for most radios of its type under twenty five dollars. If you're looking for one of this type, this model by Pyle is your best bet,
